JobFullDesc: As an Opto-Mechanical Engineer at Facebook, you will take a critical role in developing future generation AR Systems.  You will become part of a team exploring new concepts through mechanical design and fast iterative prototyping. A wide range of approaches will be explored combining electrical, mechanical, optical, firmware, and software techniques. We want people who work well in teams, can brainstorm big ideas, work in new technology areas, are able to drive a concept into a prototype and then mature the design to high-volume consumer product solutions. We are looking for someone with a productive mindset who can apply their mechanical engineering expertise to solve problems in creative, insightful ways.
